QuestData.Title: The Defense of Nahom
QuestData.Description: The enemy is coming... and in great numbers.$B$BWe will get no further reinforcements. Let us hope we can stop the Neferset advance.$B$BIf Nahom falls, Ramkahen will follow.$B$BGo outside and speak to one of my sergeants when you're ready. I will help you command the forces we have to the best of my ability.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to a Ramkahen Sergeant and succeed in the Defense of Nahom.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Salhet at Nahom in Uldum.
QuestData.CompletionText: There is no time to waste!
QuestData.RewardText: We did it, $n! We held Nahom.
